p: The EOs of lemongrass ( Cymbopogon citratus) and tea tree ( Melaleuca alternifolia) used in the study were procured from Sigma Aldrich, (Millipore Sigma, USA). The EOs were diluted in acetone solution (Merck, corporate, USA) to prepare the doses for different assays or experiments. All other reagents and chemicals used in the study were of analytical or molecular grade unless otherwise mentioned.
